name: CASE_SUMM_QUEST
description: The CASE_SUMM_QUEST table allows you to report on questionnaires (not contact-specific) in Tapestry's Chronic Disease Case Management module.

columns.name: CASE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the case record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line count of the summary questionnaire information for the case record.

columns.name: QUEST_FORM_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the summary questionnaire form.

columns.name: QUEST_FORM_ID_FORM_NAME
columns.description: The name of the form associated with the questionnaire.

columns.name: QUEST_ANSWER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the summary questionnaire answer.

columns.name: QUEST_TIME
columns.description: The time of the summary questionnaire.

columns.name: QUEST_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the user associated with the summary questionnaire.

columns.name: QUEST_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: QUEST_COMMENT
columns.description: The comment of the summary questionnaire.
